pkgmetadata.longdescription: R 'Htmlwidget' to Add Pan and Zoom to Almost any R Graphic // This 'htmlwidget' provides pan and zoom interactivity to R graphics, including 'base', 'lattice', and 'ggplot2'. The interactivity is provided through the 'svg-pan-zoom.js' library. Various options to the widget can tailor the pan and zoom experience to nearly any user desire.
